docs.abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump uses verbal shortcuts and salesmanlike tactics in his sweepingly general replies to media queries focusing on some of his questionable recollections; some admirers see Trump's dodging of specifics as refreshing and laudable but detractors score his vagueness and refusal to be pinned down on topics.

docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry made his first trip to Israel in more than a year, arriving on Tuesday in the midst of a new rash of deadly attacks that have dampened hopes for peace mediation between the Jewish state and Palestinians during the Obama administration's final year. The visit includes no such ambitious agenda, the chief U.S. diplomat conceded, and is primarily focused on ending the terror.
